participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, enjoys connecting with family and friends. Has a creative side, appreciating both music and sports.
participant_1.background: I watch highlights of basketball games on my phone while I eat breakfast. I think it's really cool to be able to build things with your own hands. My favorite band is up. I get to drive around all day while listening to my favorite country music. Others will be impressed by my video editing skills.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Caring and down-to-earth, loves animals and values a simple lifestyle. Enjoys nurturing relationships while also being mindful of her health.
participant_2.background: I drive an old car to get to gigs, but I love my cats. I like to keep my social media use to a minimum, but I love honey bees! I like people who are understanding of my diet and phobia. I have 4 pets. I like to train dogs.

content.text: Good! Just got back from a long drive to visit my brother.
wow where do you live that you have to drive that long?
I live in the Midwest. My brother lives in New York.
ah! I'm on the east coast too, but I'm in Virginia.
no, I moved here from California when I was 9.
Nice! My cousin lives in California.
no way! I lived in Costa Mesa for a while.
Wow that's crazy! Do you miss it?
a little bit. But I love it here too.
What do you like about Virginia?
I love the history and the culture.
Me too! And the food is great.
Oh yes! The food here is amazing.
